ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.2_0: At that time the monks from the group of six received almsfood in a heap. ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.3.1_0: “‘I will receive an even level of almsfood,’ this is how you should train.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.4_0: he should receive the almsfood on an even level.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.5_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, receives almsfood in a heap, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.6.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.7.2_0: To give rise to the robe.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.9_0: if he is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.10_0: The tenth training rule is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:1.11_0: The third sub-chapter on arms akimbo is finished.
